start.question:
👋 Hi there! So glad to see you here at Datt Mediproducts.

How can I assist you today?

start_followup.question: Just tap the option that fits your needs best — I’m right here with you. 😊

first.question: Got a question about any of our products? I’d be happy to help you find exactly what you need.

options.text: I need to download product catalogues

inq_one.question: Click this link to see all wound care products: 🔗https://dattmedi.com/products/wound-care.html There’s a black strip on the page to help you filter products by category.

inq_one_followup.question: Hope this helps! Do you have any other questions? 🙂

inq_one_mail.question:
Great! Feel free to ask, or email us at 
📩 online@dattmedi.com

inq_one_goodbye.question: Tata bye bye! 👋 Come back anytime.

inq_two.question: Here’s the link to all advanced wound care products: 🔗https://dattmedi.com/products/advance-wound-care.html Use the black strip to filter and find exactly what you need.

inq_two_followup.question:
Hope this serves your purpose!
Any other questions I can help with? 🙂

inq_two_mail.question:
You can type your question or email us at 
📩 online@dattmedi.com

inq_two_goodbye.question: Okay! Take care and visit again anytime.👋

inq_three.question: Of course! 😊 Here's how you can download the product brochures: Step 1: Visit the category you're interested in – 🔹For Wound Care: https://dattmedi.com/products/wound-care.html 🔹For Advanced Wound Care: https://dattmedi.com/products/advance-wound-care.html Step 2: Browse and click on the product you want to know more about. Step 3: On the product page, look to the right side: You’ll see a ‘Download Brochure’ button. Click it and your catalogue will be downloaded 📄

inq_three_followup.question: Let me know if you need help with anything else! 😊

inq_three_mail.question:
Go ahead and ask, or email us at 
📩 online@dattmedi.com

inq_three_goodbye.question: Okay! Have a great day and come back anytime. 👋

second.question:
Looking to place a bulk order? That’s great to hear! 😊
Can you tell me who you are?

order_one.question: Thanks! For smaller bulk needs (like stocking up at home), the easiest way is through our bulk order page.

order_one_link.question: 🛒 Click here to place a bulk order directly: 👉 https://dattmedi.com/eshop/bulk-order/

order_one_happy.question: Glad to know that! 😊 Let me know if you need anything else.

order_two_goodbye.question: No worries! You can reach us anytime if you need help.

order_three_followup.question: Should you need further assistance, feel free to contact our team directly.

order_three_goodbye.question: Alright! Feel free to explore the site or message us anytime.

Feel free to reach our team at

order_five_goodbye.question: Alright! Have a great day ahead. Let me know if anything else comes up.

third.question:
Thanks for your interest in partnering with us! 😊
We truly value collaborations and are always open to exploring new distributor relationships.

third_followup.question: To get started, can you tell us a bit about yourself?

options.text: I just want to know the process

dist_one_link.question:
You can explore how distributorship works and fill out your details here:

👉 https://dattmedi.com/distributor-india/ We’ll review your request and connect with you soon.

dist_one_followup.question:
If you'd prefer to speak to someone directly, feel free to reach us at:
📩 online@dattmedi.com | 📞 +91-98106 33482

dist_two.question: Wonderful! 🌍 We love working with global partners.

dist_two_link.question:
You can learn more and send us your details here:

👉 https://dattmedi.com/distributor-international/ Once we receive your form, our team will review and respond.

dist_two_followup.question:
If you want to directly reach out, contact us at:
📩 online@dattmedi.com | 📞 +91-98106 33482.

dist_three.question:
Of course! Here's a quick look at the distributorship process:

1. Fill out the relevant form on our website
2. Our team reviews your details
3. We reach out to discuss the opportunity
4. If it’s a good fit, we take things forward together 🤝

dist_three_link.question:
Choose based on your region:

👉 India:

https://dattmedi.com/distributor-india/

👉 International:

https://dattmedi.com/distributor-international/

dist_three_followup.question:
Still have questions? Feel free to contact us at:
📩 online@dattmedi.com | 📞 +91-98106 33482.

fourth.question: Looking to shop online? 😊 That’s perfect!

fourth_link.question:
Our eShop has a wide range of wound care and first-aid products. You can explore and order directly from here:

👉 https://dattmedi.com/eshop/

fourth_followup.question: Would you like help navigating the store?

options.text: I want to buy in bulk

purchase_one.question:
Sure! You can view all available products here:

👉 https://dattmedi.com/eshop/ There’s a white category menu at the top — use it to browse by type. The “Sort by” option on the right can help you filter too.

purchase_one_followup.question:
Need help finding something specific? Contact us anytime at:
📩 online@dattmedi.com | 📞 +91-98106 33482

purchase_two.question:
On our eShop page

👉 https://dattmedi.com/eshop/ You’ll see a white menu with categories like Wound Care, Orthopedic Supports, etc. Just click on a category to view those products. Use the “Sort by” option on the right to arrange products by popularity, price, or latest.

purchase_two_followup.question:
Still need help? Feel free to reach out:
📩 online@dattmedi.com | 📞 +91-98106 33482

purchase_three.question:
For bulk purchases, please use our bulk order form here:

👉 https://dattmedi.com/eshop/bulk-order/ It’s quick and easy. Fill in your requirements, and we’ll reach out shortly.

purchase_three_followup.question:
For urgent queries, contact us directly at:
📩 online@dattmedi.com | 📞 +91-98106 33482

purchase_four.question: No worries — we’re here to help you!

purchase_four_query.question: Make sure you're logged in, add your products to cart, and proceed to checkout. Still stuck? Just reach out and we’ll assist you.

purchase_four_followup.question:
You can contact our team anytime at:
📩 online@dattmedi.com | 📞 +91-98106 33482
